review: Dr Suresh diagnosis the issue very well. I always prefer to consult him for any cold, fever and throat infection issues.

I had consulted few hospitals and gave lot of test and scans to do, still the diagnose for my feet swelling and pain was not done correctly. After meeting Dr. Suresh G he correctly diagnosed and gave correct medicine and next day I was able to walk without pain. Thank you.

I come from doctor family and I tried to explain the course of action done till now. He was reluctant to listen to that and at first he mentioned to stop using medicine prescribed by my doctor and later on gave the same family medicine.  He was not very willing to listen to us which is not acceptable when it comes to treating educated patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience was very bad, he was rude and just wanted to finish off quickly.. he was arrogant when I tried to explain my situation..he examined me when I was standing there and did not bother to ask me to sit down. Please see other options if you can.
Even though the appointment was booked through Practo, clinic staff charged higher consultation fee.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I went today to show my throat today for cough. Dr. Suresh G was extremely professional with the diagnosis. He took 3-5 mins and check up was done. Staff was also polite and I got my appointment as soon as i reached.

Experience says it all...We had a very bad experience from Apollo Mahadevpura. Dr.Suresh G was able to easily recognize the health condition and the medication worked immediately for Dengue.Thanks for the help and would recommend everyone to consult for your health issues
*** ** *** **** ******* * **** *****he is humble and patient..he is our familiy's first choice for physician consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is pretty experienced. after listening to the symptoms, he diagnosed Dengue. we were able to get the early diagnosis and treatment with continued monitoring by doctor. very happy to have come across the doctor

review: Though I had to wait for more than an hour, it was worth meeting dis doctor..he explained the issue very clearly and prescribed the right medicines for me..thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is not friendly. There is a lot of arrogance. Doctor doesn't like to be asked questions. Not recommended.
Doctor is not reachable always suggest clinical tests and not friendly in explaining the issue and diagnosis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i wa suffering from severe coughing and throat pain from past one week. doctor explained the issue nicely and after taking his medicine within few hours i got relief. Thanks a lot sir!!
The price which was shown on practo was different when charged in clinic. They charged extra 200 rs in addition to the consultation fees.
He is a well experienced doctor, nice behaviour , i feel tension less after meeting him . recommending him to all

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is not friendly at all, he just see the report and write on paper. Has to understand and be friendly with customers. 
I couldnt be able to express my problems ******* ** *** ************. I dont go to him again.
No point booking the appointment online. Wait time was around 2 hours even after prior booking. Doctor experience was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was very good and the doctor was bery friendly.
He took time and explined everything very nicely.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Visited when my husband had fever. Doctor is a bit rude when it comes to communicating with the patient but overall he has good experience and makes sure to check one well and clear any doubts. 
I found him little rude though.
